issue.title: [R] Patches to 0.16.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CRAN did not like 0.16.0 as originally submitted. This contains the patches in the 0.16.0.1 resubmission.

comments.body:
